data.name: ReadCaseRole1
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (TYPE = 'AP') and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCaseRole2
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (TYPE = 'AR') and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)
